statements: SELECT * FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT equipment_name, last_serviced_date FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT equipment_id, next_servicing_due_date FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT equipment_name, next_servicing_due_date FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE last_serviced_date <= '2022-11-30';
SELECT * FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE equipment_name = 'Excavator'
SELECT equipment_name, last_serviced_date FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE equipment_id > 100 ORDER BY last_serviced_date DESC
SELECT equipment_name, next_servicing_due_date FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE next_servicing_due_date >= '2022-10-01' ORDER BY next_servicing_due_date ASC
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE last_serviced_date IS NOT NULL AND next_servicing_due_date IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY equipment_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, next_maintenance_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE next_maintenance_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type='routine' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2022-06-15';
SELECT es.schedule_id, es.maintenance_type, e.equipment_name FROM MaintenanceSchedule es INNER JOIN Equipment e ON es.equipment_id = e.equipment_id;
SELECT e.equipment_name, e.last_maintenance_date, ms.maintenance_type FROM Equipment e LEFT JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ms ON e.equipment_id = ms.equipment_id;
SELECT e.equipment_name, MAX(ms.maintenance_date) AS last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment e LEFT JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ms ON e.equipment_id = ms.equipment_id GROUP BY e.equipment_name;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT name, manufacturer FROM Equipment WHERE manufacturer IS NOT NULL;
SELECT equipment_id, name, manufacturer, last_service_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY last_service_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE service_interval > 50;
SELECT equipment_id, service_date, service_done_by FROM ServiceRecords WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT name, manufacturer FROM Equipment ORDER BY manufacturer, name DESC;

SELECT e.name, s.service_date, sr.service_done_by FROM Equipment e JOIN ServiceRecords sr ON e.equipment_id = sr.equipment_id JOIN MaintenanceSchedule s ON e.equipment_id = s.equipment_id WHERE s.next_service_date < '2023-01-01';

SELECT e.name, s.next_service_date, sr.service_done_by FROM Equipment e JOIN ServiceRecords sr ON e.equipment_id = sr.equipment_id JOIN MaintenanceSchedule s ON e.equipment_id = s.equipment_id WHERE sr.service_done_by = 'John Doe' AND sr.notes LIKE '%checked%';

SELECT e.name, s.service_date, s.next_service_date FROM Equipment e JOIN MaintenanceSchedule s ON e.equipment_id = s.equipment_id WHERE s.next_service_date < NOW() AND s.next_service_date > s.service_date;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT e.equipment_name, t.technician_name FROM Equipment e INNER JOIN Technicians t ON e.equipment_id = t.technician_id;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, manufacturer FROM Equipment;
SELECT schedule_id, equipment_id, schedule_date, technician_id, status FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT * FROM Technicians ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, manufacturer, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT schedule_id, equipment_id, schedule_date, technician_id, status FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-04-01';
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_required = TRUE;
SELECT technician_name, technician_specialty FROM Technicians ORDER BY technician_specialty ASC;
SELECT log_id, equipment_id, maintenance_date, technician_name FROM MaintenanceLogs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, technician_id FROM ServiceRecords WHERE technician_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, last_serviced_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY last_serviced_date DESC;
SELECT e.equipment_name, s.technician_name FROM ServiceRecords s JOIN Equipment e ON s.equipment_id = e.equipment_id;
SELECT e.equipment_name, l.maintenance_date, l.maintenance_description FROM MaintenanceLogs l JOIN Equipment e ON l.equipment_id = e.equipment_id WHERE l.maintenance_date >= '2021-01-01';

SELECT t.technician_name, COUNT(sr.record_id) AS total_records FROM Technicians t LEFT JOIN ServiceRecords sr ON t.technician_id = sr.technician_id GROUP BY t.technician_name ORDER BY total_records DESC;
